categoryRubrics.rule: Generally, the identifiers found within a CDA document should be unique and non-reoccurring within the same document.
Patient DOB should be valid and properly precisioned

referenceErrors.description: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:5252, CONF:10036 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Procedure Activity Act2 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12:2014-06-09. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).
